mapper.insert: insert into store (name, address, boss, phone) values (#{name}, #{address}, #{boss}, #{phone});
mapper.update: update store set name = #{name}, address = #{address}, boss = #{boss}, phone = #{phone} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select id, name, address, boss, phone from store limit #{start}, #{pageSize};
select id, name, address, boss, phone from store;
